nodes.text: "R2-D2 - A Loyal Droid" is the fourth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com and the Disney Now websites on November 30, 2018.

The episode opens with Princess Leia Organa recording her hologram message to Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi with R2-D2. At that point, C-3PO enters the room and is relieved to find R2-D2. Princess Leia then scurries into hiding. C-3PO asks R2-D2 where he has been. C-3PO then rushes out into the corridor where a gun battle between stormtroopers and rebel troopers is taking place.

R2-D2 tells C-3PO he is on a secret mission to deliver some plans. R2-D2 dodges blaster bolts to walk past the corridor with C-3PO following suit. R2-D2 runs into the path of stormtroopers but rebel troopers shoot them, causing an explosion. R2-D2 travels pat the smoke with C-3PO following him. The two watch a lightsaber–wielding Darth Vader walk past the corridor. The two hear the voice of man screaming as he is cut down by Lord Vader. As they enter an an escape pod, C-3PO asks R2-D2 if he is sure it is safe. As the escape pod blasts off into space, C-3PO remarks he is going to regret this.
